events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's issue has been classified under the Refund category due to their request for money back.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello, thank you for contacting support. I understand you'd like a refund for your recent order, and I'm here to assist you.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the incorrect item you received? This will help us process your refund.
Sure, my order number is 1289347, and attached is a picture showing the wrong item delivered instead of the jacket I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund immediately and arrange for the incorrect item to be picked up at your convenience.
That sounds great, thank you for handling this quickly. I appreciate your assistance.
The refund has been processed successfully and the pick-up for the wrong item is scheduled. Please let us know if you need any further help.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and that the return process went smoothly.
Yes, the refund appeared on my account yesterday and the pick-up went fine. Thanks again for the excellent service.
We are glad to hear everything was resolved. Closing this case now, and feel free to reach out anytime.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey via email. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
